sentences.english: Huayan is a very famous artist with good reputation in the Chinese painting history.
sentences.chinese: 华嵒是中国绘画史上享有较高声誉的一位画家。

sentences.english: Instead, check out the company' s reputation through the industry grapevine.
sentences.chinese: 与其这样做，不如通过行业内线来了解该公司的声誉。

sentences.english: The high-quality service of this hotel has won a high reputation Both at home and aBroad.
sentences.chinese: 该宾馆的优质服务，在国内外享有很高声誉。

sentences.english: The above firm enjoys the fullest respect and unquestionable confidence in the business world.
sentences.chinese: 上述公司在实业界颇受尊敬，并享有很高的声誉。

sentences.english: Avocados have gotten a bad reputation as being high in fat.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨由于脂肪含量高而得不到好的声誉。

sentences.english: Your company has an impressive reputation and I've always wanted to work for a smaller company.
sentences.chinese: 你的公司声誉很好，我一直想在规模较小的公司工作。

sentences.english: The military product series made by the company enjoy high reputation in the international military trade market.
sentences.chinese: 所产军品系列产品在国际军贸市场上享有较高的声誉。

sentences.english: That can jeopardize organizational reputations and undermine the credibility of their information.
sentences.chinese: 那就有可能会损害组织的声誉并削弱信息的可信度。

sentences.english: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
sentences.chinese: 你不可以用计画如何做来建立个人声誉。

sentences.english: First of all, I know your firm has a very good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我知道你们公司的声誉很好。

sentences.english: Peridot is given as a symbol of fame, dignity, and protection.
sentences.chinese: 橄榄石是给出一个声誉，尊严的象征，和保护。

sentences.english: In friendship, your word as your honor is a given.
sentences.chinese: 在友谊里，你说话算话就会有好声誉。

sentences.english: Target has maintained its reputation for stylish clothes at low prices.
sentences.chinese: 塔吉特已经在时尚衣物的低价格方面保持着声誉。

sentences.english: We nave opened a confirmed credit in your favour.
sentences.chinese: 声誉证例文我们已开出以贵方为受益人的保兑声誉证。

sentences.english: We nave opened a confirmed credit in your favour.
sentences.chinese: 声誉证例文我们已开出以贵方为受益人的保兑声誉证。

sentences.english: After many years development, REHAU aquarium product establishes a good reputation within the customers.
sentences.chinese: 经过多年发展，瑞好水族在客户中建立了良好的声誉。

definition: to be thoroughly discredited/to fall into disrepute
Weixin county in Zhaotong 昭通[Zhao1 tong1], Yunnan
